entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oxford House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 35. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 35. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 34. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
